title: Randomized Controlled Trial Comparing Propranolol, Endoscopic Banding Ligation, and Combined Treatment to Prevent First Variceal Hemorrhage in Patients With Liver Cirrhosis

operands.value: Liver cirrhosis
Age between 18 and 70 years
Esophageal varices with high bleeding risk: more than F2 and red color sign
No previous history of upper gastrointestinal bleeding
No previous history of endoscopic, radiologic, or surgical therapy for varices or ascites
Do not take beta-blocker, ACE inhibitor, or nitrate
Child-Pugh score <12
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 70 Years
Patients with systolic blood pressure <100 mmHg or basal heart rate <60/min
Portal vein thrombosis
Uncontrolled ascites or hepatic encephalopathy
Severe coagulation disorder: prothrombin time <40% (or INR >1.7) or platelet count <30,000/mm3
Medium or large sized gastric or duodenal varices
Coexisting malignancy
Severe cardiovascular disorder, renal failure, peritonitis, sepsis
Severe erosive esophagitis, severe esophageal stricture, active gastric or duodenal ulcer
Contraindication to beta-blocker
Pregnancy
Refusal to give consent to participate in the trial

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Age between 18 and 70 years'), Symbol('Child-Pugh score <12'), Symbol('Do not take beta-blocker, ACE inhibitor, or nitrate'), Symbol('Esophageal varices with high bleeding risk: more than F2 and red color sign'), Symbol('Liver cirrhosis'), Symbol('Must have maximum age of 70 Years'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 18 Years'), Symbol('No previous history of endoscopic, radiologic, or surgical therapy for varices or ascites'), Symbol('No previous history of upper gastrointestinal bleeding'), Not(Or(Symbol('Coexisting malignancy'), Symbol('Contraindication to beta-blocker'), Symbol('Medium or large sized gastric or duodenal varices'), Symbol('Patients with systolic blood pressure <100 mmHg or basal heart rate <60/min'), Symbol('Portal vein thrombosis'), Symbol('Pregnancy'), Symbol('Refusal to give consent to participate in the trial'), Symbol('Severe cardiovascular disorder, renal failure, peritonitis, sepsis'), Symbol('Severe coagulation disorder: prothrombin time <40% (or INR >1.7) or platelet count <30,000/mm3'), Symbol('Severe erosive esophagitis, severe esophageal stricture, active gastric or duodenal ulcer'), Symbol('Uncontrolled ascites or hepatic encephalopathy'))))
